member.summary: Adds a middleware to the OWIN pipeline that validates redirects.
member.param: The to which the middleware is added.
member.returns: The supplied in the app parameter.

member.returns: The supplied in the app parameter.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.Core.RequestHeaders.GetHeaderValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of a header
member.returns: The header's values as a comma separated list, null if the header is not set.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Owin.Core.ResponseHeaders.Location
member.summary: Gets the value of the Location header if present. Otherwise returns null.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.CspDirectiveExtensions.None``1(``0)
member.summary: Sets the "none" source for the CSP directive. This source cannot be combined with other sources on a CSP directive.
member.typeparam: The type of the CSP directive configuration object.
member.param: The CSP directive configuration object.
member.exception: Thrown when sources have already been configured for the directive.

member.summary: Sets the "self" source for the CSP directive.

member.param: The CSP directive configuration object.
One or more custom sources.

member.summary: Sets the "unsafe-inline" source for the CSP directive.

member.summary: Configures the font-src directive (CSP 1.0).

member.summary: Configures the connect-src directive (CSP 1.0).

member.summary: Configures the base-uri directive (CSP 2).

member.summary: Configures the child-src directive (CSP 2).

member.summary: Configures the form-action directive (CSP 2).

member.summary: Configures the frame-ancestors directive (CSP 2).

member.summary: Configures the manifest-src directive (CSP 3).

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspOptions.PluginTypes(System.Action{NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspPluginTypesDirective})
member.summary: Configures the plugin-types directive (CSP 2).
member.param: An that configures the media types for the directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspOptions.Sandbox
member.summary: Enables the sandbox directive (CSP 2) without further ado.
member.remarks: Support for this directive was optional in CSP 1.0, but is mandatory as of CSP 2.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspOptions.Sandbox(System.Action{NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspSandboxDirective})
member.summary: Configures the sandbox directive (CSP 2) with one or more sources.
member.remarks: Support for this directive was optional in CSP 1.0, but is mandatory as of CSP 2.
member.param: An that configures the sources for the directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspOptions.UpgradeInsecureRequests(System.Int32)
member.summary: Enables the upgrade-insecure-requests directive and redirects conformant UAs to HTTPS.
member.remarks: This directive is not part of CSP 1.0 or CSP 2, but is described in a separate specification.
member.param: The HTTPS port. Defaults to 443.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspOptions.BlockAllMixedContent
member.summary: Enables the block-all-mixed-content directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspOptions.ReportUris(System.Action{NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspReportUriDirective})
member.summary: Configures the report-uri directive (CSP 1.0). Support for absolute URIs was introduced in CSP 2.
member.param: An that configures the report URIs.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspReportUriDirective
member.summary: Fluent interface to configure report URIs.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspReportUriDirective.Uris(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets report URIs for the CSP directive.
member.param: One or more report URIs.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspPluginTypesDirective.MediaTypes(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets the media types for the CSP plugin-types directive.

member.summary: Sets the 'allow-forms' source for the CSP sandbox directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspSandboxDirective.AllowModals
member.summary: Sets the 'allow-modals' source for the CSP sandbox directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspSandboxDirective.AllowOrientationLock
member.summary: Sets the 'allow-orientation-lock' source for the CSP sandbox directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspSandboxDirective.AllowPointerLock

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspSandboxDirective.AllowPopupsToEscapeSandbox
member.summary: Sets the 'allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox' source for the CSP sandbox directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentCspSandboxDirective.AllowScripts

member.name: T:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHpkpOptions
member.summary: Fluent interface to configure options for Http Strict Transport Security.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHpkpOptions.MaxAge(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies the max age for the HPKP header.
member.param: The number of days added to max age.
The number of hours added to max age.
The number of minutes added to max age.
The number of seconds added to max age.
member.exception: Thrown if a negative value was supplied in any of the parameters.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHpkpOptions.IncludeSubdomains
member.summary: Enables the IncludeSubdomains directive in the HPKP header.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHpkpOptions.ReportUri(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies a report URI where the browser can send HPKP violations.
member.param: The report URI, which is an absolute URI with scheme http or https.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHpkpOptions.AllResponses
member.summary: Specifies that the HPKP header should also be set for HTTP responses. The header is always set for HTTPS responses.
member.remarks: The HPKP standard specifies that the header should only be set over secure connections, which is the default behavior. This configuration option exists to accomodate websites running behind an SSL terminator.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHpkpOptions.Sha256Pins(System.String[])
member.summary: Specifies one or more certificate pins to include in the HPKP header. A certificate pin is the Base64 encoded SHA-256 hash value of a certficate's SPKI.
member.param: One or more certficate pin values.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHpkpOptions.PinCertificate(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName)
member.summary: Specifies a certificate that should be pinned in the HPKP header.
member.param: The certificate thumbprint.
The for the certificate. The default is .
The for the certificate. The default is .

member.name: T:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHstsOptions
member.summary: Fluent interface to configure options for Http Strict Transport Security.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHstsOptions.MaxAge(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies the max age for the HSTS header.
member.param: The number of days added to max age.
The number of hours added to max age.
The number of minutes added to max age.
The number of seconds added to max age.
member.exception: Thrown if a negative value was supplied in any of the parameters.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHstsOptions.IncludeSubdomains
member.summary: Enables the IncludeSubdomains directive in the Hsts header.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHstsOptions.Preload
member.summary: Enables the Preload directive in the HSTS header. MaxAge must be at least 18 weeks, and IncludeSubdomains must be enabled.
member.remarks: Read more about preloaded HSTS sites at www.chromium.org/sts

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHstsOptions.UpgradeInsecureRequests
member.summary: Sets the HSTS header only when the user agent signals that it supports the upgrade-insecure-requests CSP directive.
member.remarks: This setting is intended to be used in combination with the upgrade-insecure-requests CSP directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHstsOptions.AllResponses
member.summary: Specifies that the HSTS header should also be set for HTTP responses. The header is always set for HTTPS responses.
member.remarks: The HSTS standard specifies that the header should only be set over secure connections, which is the default behavior. This configuration option exists to accomodate websites running behind an SSL terminator.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentHstsOptions.HttpsOnly
member.summary: Specifies that the HSTS header should be set for HTTPS responses only.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentRedirectValidationOptions
member.summary: Fluent interface to configure options for redirect validation.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentRedirectValidationOptions.AllowedDestinations(System.String[])
member.summary: Configures the allowed redirect destinations. These must be well formed absolute URIs.
member.param: Allowed redirect destinations.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentRedirectValidationOptions.AllowSameHostRedirectsToHttps(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Allows same host redirects to HTTPS.
member.param: Allowed destination port(s) for redirects to HTTPS. The default HTTPS port (443) is assumed if no values are configured.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXFrameOptions
member.summary: Fluent interface to configure options for X-Frame-Options.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXFrameOptions.Deny
member.summary: Enables the Deny directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXFrameOptions.SameOrigin
member.summary: Enables the SameOrigin directive.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions
member.summary: Fluent interface to configure options for X-Robots-Tag.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions.NoIndex
member.summary: Enables the noindex directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions.NoFollow
member.summary: Enables the nofollow directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions.NoSnippet
member.summary: Enables the nosnippet directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions.NoArchive
member.summary: Enables the noarchive directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions.NoOdp
member.summary: Enables the noodp directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions.NoTranslate
member.summary: Enables the notranslate directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXRobotsTagOptions.NoImageIndex
member.summary: Enables the noimageindex directive.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXXssProtectionOptions
member.summary: Fluent interface to configure options for X-Xss-Protection.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXXssProtectionOptions.Disabled
member.summary: Configures the header to explicitly disable protection.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXXssProtectionOptions.Enabled
member.summary: Configures the header to explicitly enable protection.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Owin.IFluentXXssProtectionOptions.EnabledWithBlockMode
member.summary: Configures the header to explicitly enable protection with block mode.
